release.action: Fixed time information handling of dates. The time information of an end date was set to 00:00:00.000 excluding the day. It will now be set to 23:59:59.999 including the day so that a currency starting at 06/21/1948 and ending at 12/31/2001 is now interpreted to actually start at 06/21/1948 00:00:00.000 and end at 12/31/2001 23:59:59.999.
Attached default currency configuration to the artifact and removed it from the artifact's jar file.

Added interface CurrenciesProvider and class ClasspathCurrenciesProvider implementing the former classpath resource lookup mechanism. Updated class XMLCurrencyDirectory to use any available CurrenciesProvider implementation for reading XML resources.
Added support for monitoring resources with a file URI scheme for changes to support dynamic reloading of changed files.
Updated the XML module descriptor to the 1.1 model version.
